summary: This document contains various financial records and corporate resolutions related to Financial Strategy Group, Ltd., including amendments to articles of incorporation, certifications of beneficial ownership, and corporate governance documents. It highlights the involvement of key individuals such as Jeffrey Epstein and Darren Indyke in the management and operations of the corporation. This document is a written consent of the sole shareholder of Southern Country International, Ltd., authorizing various corporate actions following the death of Jeffrey E. Epstein. It outlines the changes in the board of directors and confirms the estate's control over the corporation.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was the President of Financial Strategy Group, Ltd.
Darren Indyke served as Secretary and was involved in corporate governance.
Richard Kahn was the Treasurer and participated in financial decisions.
Financial Strategy Group, Ltd. was incorporated on March 4, 2014.
The corporation applied for international banking entity status in the U.S. Virgin Islands.
Jeffrey E. Epstein was the sole record shareholder of Southern Country International, Ltd. and passed away on August 10, 2019.
Darren K. Indyke and Richard D. Kahn are co-executors of Epstein's estate and have become the sole shareholders of the corporation.
The board of directors of Southern Country International, Ltd. was reduced to two members following Epstein's death.
The corporation is in good standing and has filed all necessary reports and paid applicable taxes as of November 21, 2019.
